title: Client Problems.
body:
https://imgur.com/a/qWNGj

I have been playing with friends recently and running discord and my PC literally crashes at 17-23 minutes into every game. I have been running diagnostics and don't know what to do, and I am a bit sad about being placed in low priority queue because of this. Any help?

Or is as simple as I can't run Discord and League at the same time..?

replies.body:
It might not be the first thing you wanted to hear, but this almost sounds like your pc might be running out of memory. It's hard to say for sure without knowing what kind of error you're seeing in those crashes, but let's first try running League without Discord up in the background and see how that goes. 

If those crashes continue, try to grab a screenshot of any errors you see and shoot 'em my way!
